cnd8:16.2: yānīdhatthi → yānipatthi (bj, sya-all) | yāni atthi (si, mr)
cnd8:20.3: paneva → panetaṃ (sya-all), appatiṭṭhitacitto → appatiṭṭhīnacitto (sya-all), alīnamanaso → ādinamanaso (sya-all)
cnd8:32.5: jātassūpanibandhakaṃ → jātassupanibandhataṃ (bj), parādheyyakaṃ → parādheyyataṃ (bj), ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, sya-all)
cnd8:48.2: kittitaṃ → akitti taṃ (sya-all), pakittitaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all potthakesu, paññapitaṃ → paññāpitaṃ (mr)
cnd8:50.10: palāpo → lāpo palāpo (sya-all), lālappanā lālappitattaṃ → lālappāyanā lālappāyittaṃ (cck) | lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
cnd8:68.6: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule → phoṭṭhabbe kule (bj, sya-all, csp1ed)
cnd8:68.8: loke vesā visattikā → yā sā loke visattikā (sya-all)
cnd8:71.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (sya-all, mr), desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj) | desanaṃ anusandhiṃ (sya-all)
cnd8:78.2: anāgataṃ → uddhaṃ vuccati anāgataṃ (bj, cck, mr) | uddhanti vuccati anāgataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
cnd8:84.9: kathāhaṃ → kadāhaṃ (sya-all), anuggaṇheyyan”ti → anugaṇheyyanti (bj), appaṭivānī → appaṭivāni (mr)
cnd8:89.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (sya-all), anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanā anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj) | desanaṃ anusandhiṃ abhinandāmīti (sya-all)
cnd8:116.6: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi → ñāṇaṃ ...pe... sabbavedamaticca vedagū soti (sya-all)
cnd8:119.6: bandhe vibandhe ābandhe → baddhe vibaddhe ābaddhe (bj), palibuddhe → paḷibuddhe (bj), phoṭayitvā → mocayitvā (sya-all)
